entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:44 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -31.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
